name: fall guys (pavan.movva)
description:
Use your favorite keys to play! (means WSAD or arrow key to move).

Dodge the oncoming objects!

Bump opponents off the side for extra points!

Bump 10 off for an extra life!

Get on the high score table!

Click the fall guy on the title screen!

Jump through those mouth gates to avoid damage!

Heart and Star and Follow!  (Y'know... If you want)

Opponents are not online players. They're just NPCs.

This game is inspired by Fall Guys Ultimate Knockout!

Art and music is from there.

The foundation of the coding is from @zdestefano70  

Extra coding help from @dad76

High score saving technology by @rokcoder

Want to play Multiplayer Fall Guys?
